sections.heading: Repealed.Section 7-18A-2 - Repealed
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1995, ch. 101, § 1 repealed 7-18A-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1989, ch. 327, § 2, relating to the short title of the Controlled Substance Tax Act, effective July 1, 1995. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1994 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
